directions: Combine chicken, mango, onion, cilantro, and jalapeno together in a bowl. Drizzle the juice from 1 lime, olive oil, and kosher salt over the chicken mixture and mix.
Mash avocados in a bowl with remaining juice from 1 lime and kosher salt to taste.
Top each tortilla chip with a dollop of the avocado mixture and a dollop of the chicken mixture and place on a platter.
ingredients: 2 ripe avocados - halved, pitted, and peeled
title: Mini Chicken and Mango Tostadas
